summary: Gym Member Portal: A web application where trainers can create and update workout plans, clients can track their progress in real-time, and includes an AI assistant named VORTEX. The app creator has full admin control over branding (logo, colors), user management, and app publication settings. Clients can access workout timetables, diet plans, exercise guides with videos, and proper reps/sets for all body muscle training. Future subscription model planned at 21 rupees.
architectural_notes: Real-time data synchronization required for workout progress tracking
Centralized admin control over all app settings and user permissions
Video hosting and streaming infrastructure needed for exercise demonstration videos
Diet plan database with nutritional information and meal recommendations
Exercise library categorized by body muscle groups with detailed instructions
Future payment integration required for subscription model at 21 rupees

Default weekly training schedule template needed: Monday (Chest+biceps+forearm), Tuesday (Back+triceps), Wednesday (Shoulder+chest+forearms), Thursday (Tricep+biceps+abs), Friday (Back+shoulder), Saturday (Legs+abs)
Exercise database must include sets, reps, muscle group targets, and form notes in Hindi/English mix for Indian audience
Diet plan system should support multiple meal options per time slot with Indian-specific foods (Dal, Roti, Paneer, Sattu, etc.)
known_issues: 'Get Started' button still not working as expected - user wants direct app access without login flow
VORTEX AI assistant should be presented immediately on app start for user guidance
VORTEX AI assistant responses are not conversational enough - user wants GPT-like conversation quality
VORTEX AI assistant not responding correctly to user queries - responses don't match what the user asks
VORTEX AI assistant returning generic error messages instead of processing user requests

existing_features.title: Create a trainer dashboard UI where trainers can view their assigned clients, create new workout plans, edit existing plans, and see client progress summaries.
Create a client dashboard UI where clients can view their assigned workout plans, log workout completions with actual metrics, and see their progress history with charts.

Create an admin control panel UI where the app creator can upload and change the logo, customize color scheme (primary, secondary, accent colors), manage all users (add/edit/remove trainers and clients), and assign clients to trainers.
Create a VORTEX AI assistant chat interface accessible to all users with a conversation view, message input, and contextual responses based on user role and workout data.
Apply the customizable branding (logo and colors) throughout the entire application UI so all users see the admin-configured theme.
Implement role-based access control so admins can access all features, trainers can only manage their assigned clients' workouts, and clients can only view and update their own progress.

Design a professional fitness-focused visual theme with energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless customized), modern typography, and clean layouts that work well for gym and fitness contexts. The theme should feel motivating and athletic while maintaining clarity and usability across trainer, client, and admin interfaces.

Investigate and fix the 'Get Started' button on the LandingPage component (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) so that clicking it properly triggers the Internet Identity login flow using the login() function from useInternetIdentity hook

Remove the Internet Identity login requirement from the 'Get Started' button on the LandingPage component (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) so that clicking it directly navigates users into the app without triggering authentication
Display the VORTEX AI assistant chat interface automatically when the app loads, so users are immediately greeted by the AI assistant for guidance without needing to click the VORTEX button
Update the App.tsx routing logic to remove authentication checks and role-based routing, allowing all users to access the app directly without requiring a logged-in identity or profile setup

Improve the VortexChat component (frontend/src/components/vortex/VortexChat.tsx) to better display AI responses with proper formatting, line breaks, and structure to ensure answers are readable and well-organized

Add a timetable management interface to the trainer dashboard where trainers can schedule workout sessions for their clients by selecting client, date, time, and workout plan

Add a diet plan creator and editor interface to the trainer dashboard where trainers can design meal plans with multiple meals, add food items with portions and nutritional data, and assign plans to clients
